Optimization/Nesting

Optimizer priority: Offer a greater range of values for Yield vs Labor 
 
 
 Saw/Block Nest Offcut improvements 
 
 
 Give preference to offcut vs the whole sheet 
 
 
 Only use an offcut if it does not create a new offcut from it 
 
 
 If offcuts are used prefer similar from Offcut Manager 
 
 
 Prefer biggest offcut from Offcut Manager 
 
 
 Add Bin Name and option to save pieces as smallest size

xLabel App

xLabel App User Experience refreshed : 
 
 
 Option to display part size on parts in pattern view 
 
 
 Show CutWidth x CutLength In xLabel Part Selector 
 
 
 Swipe navigation between patterns in pattern view 
 
 
 Swipe navigation between labels in label view 
 
 
 Switch from old buttonbar to ribbonbar 
 
 
 New improved colors in user interface 
 
 
 
 
 Material names in xLabel jobs no longer truncated and match name length from CV Material Manager
